entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: The headmaster of Hogwarts, mentioned as saying 'Yes, yes, well done, Slytherin' and 'I have a few last-minute points to dish out.'

entities.name: slytherin
entities.description: A house at Hogwarts, mentioned as having students who are cheering and stamping.

entities.name: draco malfoy
entities.description: A Slytherin student, mentioned as banging his goblet on the table.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: A Gryffindor student, mentioned as seeing Draco Malfoy banging his goblet on the table.

entities.name: gryffindor
entities.description: A house at Hogwarts, mentioned as receiving fifty points for the best-played game of chess.

entities.name: ronald weasley
entities.description: A Gryffindor student, mentioned as being awarded fifty points for the best-played game of chess.

entities.name: mcgonagall
entities.description: A teacher at Hogwarts, mentioned as having a giant chess set.

relationships.description: Dumbledore is addressing the Slytherin table.
Dumbledore awards fifty points to Gryffindor house.
Ron Weasley is a member of Gryffindor house.
